Subbed Projects.Show Name: Corpse Party: Tortured Souls - Bougyakusareta Tamashii no Jukyou

Good Comments: cause there is no someone else doing it and the quality of subs are actualy quite good.
They use some weird punctuation ("?...", several times capitalized after a comma), but translation is accurate
Bad Comments: This is a decent translation. However, there certainly are a few mistranslations, of which ep 4 has the most.
"Vengeful sprint". Except for that one typo, 10/10, way better than GG (not saying GG is unwatchable, just inferior).

Good Comments: Only group to have subbed this so far.
